overview: In this deeply touching memoir, filmmaker Courtney Sposato explores her childhood experience of her brotherâ€™s illness while learning about the wonders of the galaxy aboard a replica of the space shuttle Challenger, created by her elementary schoolteacher from a dilapidated bus. A love letter to teachers, a lesson about grief and a beacon of hope, The Blake is a revelation of connections wrapped in Saturnian rings.
title: The Blake
